Zigzagoon (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0262: Mightyena
Pokémon
#0264: Linoone →

Zigzagoon has been featured on 9 different cards since it debuted in the EX Ruby & Sapphire expansion of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Zigzagoon cards are normally Colorless-type or Darkness-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Zigzagoon

Zigzagoon
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
Card Type Mark English

Zigzagoon EX Emerald 74/106 Deoxys Half Deck   008/019

McDonald's Collection 2015   11/12
